item.title: Walnut and Oak Coat Hook
item.description: October 14th, 2021 This coat rack is made from walnut and quarter sawn white oak from Mayan Hardwood. The design is from Foureyes Furniture.

item.title: Wood and Concrete Side Table
item.description: September 18, 2021 This side table is built from left over materials from another project. The base is consturcted from a redwood 2x4, and the top is from 20lbs of Quikrete concrete mix.The concrete is sealed with Cheng food-safe concrete countertop sealer. The table was originally build to be used outside, but has since found its home indoors.

item.title: Walnut Side Table
item.description: September 9th, 2021 This side table is build entirely of Walnut lumber from Mayan Hardwood. The grain wraps continuously around the apron of the table, including through the draw front as well. I have yet to install a pull knob on the draw, as I’m looking for the just the right design to accent the table.

item.title: Four Cube Storage Bench
item.description: June 15th, 2021 This cabinet was built from 3/4 inch Russian Birch plywood. The trim on the front of the cabinet is Burmese Teak from Mayan Hardwood. The paint is Jean Jacket Blue in a matte finish from Behr.

item.title: Outdoor Bar with Concrete Countertop
item.description: June 15th, 2021 This outdoor bar is made of redwood and concrete. The base was constructed from redwood construction lumber and redwood fence pickets. The concrete was poured into a mold, and the small voids in the top were filled with white grout. The concrete was sealed with Cheng food-safe concrete countertop sealer.

item.title: Storage Cabinet
item.description: May 21st, 2021 This cabinet was built from 3/4 inch Russian Birch plywood. The feet for the cabinet are made by laminating multiple pieces of plywood and cutting a slight taper on two sides. The paint is Chatura Gray in a satin finish from Sherwin-Williams.

item.title: Shoe Bench
item.description: April 2nd, 2021 This cabinet was built from 3/4 inch Russian Birch plywood. The legs are from DIY Hairin Legs. The paint is Chatura Gray in a satin finish from Sherwin-Williams.

item.title: 3D Printed Umbrella Bracket
item.description: November 3rd, 2020 This bracket was designed in Fusion 360 and printed on my Prusa i3 MK3S. It’s used to attach a Sport-Brella to patio chair.

item.title: Filament Rack
item.description: February 9th, 2020 Metal shelf brackets and a 1" pine wood dowel were purchased from The Home Depot. I designed the brackets to attach to the shelf brackets and hold the wood dowel using Fusion 360. The brackets were printed on my Prusa i3 MK3S in Prusament PLA Filament.

item.title: 3D Printed Names
item.description: December 17th, 2019 These 3D printed names were designed in Fusion 360 and printed on my Prusa i3 MK3S in Prusament PLA Filament.

item.title: 3D Printed GoPro Battery Box
item.description: September 21st, 2019 This GoPro battery box was designed with Fusion 360 and printed on my Prusa i3 MK3S in Galaxy Black Prusament filament. The box holds 10 GoPro batteries.

item.title: String Art
item.description: June 22nd, 2019 This string art decoration is made from walnut. The nails are copper flashing nails.

item.title: 3D Printed Hanging Pot
item.description: May 30th, 2019 This hanging pot was designed with Fusion 360 and printed on my Prusa i3 MK3S in Galaxy Black Prusament filament. The pot is a 2-piece design that allows the inner pot to be removed from the outer pot.

item.title: Floating Shelf
item.description: May 30th, 2019 This floating shelf is made from poplar and finished with Arm-R-Seal by General Finishes.

item.title: Cedar Planter Boxes
item.description: May 18th, 2019 These planter boxes are made from redwood fence slates. Special thanks to those who helped make this possible.

item.title: 3D Printer Drawer Organizer
item.description: March 16th, 2019 The silver connectors are 3D printed and the wood is 1/4" lattice slates.

item.title: Map String Art
item.description: March 13th, 2019 This wood is cedar, copper flashing nails were used to create the outlines, and string was used to connect the nails. Special thanks to those that helped make this possible.

item.title: Tea Box
item.description: February 1st, 2019 This tea box is made from red oak. It can hold over 60 tea bags. There are movable dividers that can be placed into various locations as the supply decreases.

item.title: Pencil Boxes
item.description: December 17th, 2017 These pencil boxes are made from red oak. The boxes are lined with black felt.

item.title: Decorative Sign
item.description: December 2nd, 2017 The frame is made from poplar. The slats are red oak. The"S" is MDF and was cut out by hand.

item.title: Bottle Opener
item.description: October 28th, 2017 This bottle opener is made from maple. There are 5 rare earth magnets embedded into the back of the wood to catch the bottle caps.

item.title: String Art
item.description: October 15th, 2017 This string art decoration is made from walnut. The nails are copper flashing nails.

item.title: Purple Heart Key Rack
item.description: February 4th, 2017 This keyrack is made purple heart. The hooks are from McMASTER-CARR.

item.title: Side Table
item.description: July 2nd, 2016 This side table is made from construction-grade lumber.

item.title: Temperature Brick
item.description: August 20th, 2016 This concrete brick that contains an RGB LCD screen powered by a Raspberry Pi Zero. The LCD screen displays the current temperature, as well as the high and low for the day. The color of the LCD screen changes based on the current temperature.

item.title: String Art
item.description: October 6th, 2015 This string art decoration is made from cedar. The nails are copper flashing nails.

item.title: String Art
item.description: July 19th, 2015 This string art decoration is made from cedar. The nails are copper flashing nails.

item.title: Tea Box
item.description: July 1st, 2015 This tea box is made from red oak using box joints. It holds up to 40 tea bags. There is a movable center divider that can be placed into 8 different locations as the supply decreases.

item.title: Undersink Cabinet
item.description: June 28th, 2015 This cabinet is built to go underneath a bathroom sink cabinet.

item.title: Animal Hook Coat Rack
item.description: December 1st, 2014 This coat rack is made from red oak. The animals are hand painted.

item.title: Key Rack
item.description: October 1st, 2014 This keyrack was made from clear pine. The hooks are from Woodcraft.
